name: LineLeap
headline: LineLeap gets customers to the fun, faster.
description:
LineLeap gets customers to the fun, faster. On LineLeap’s mobile app customers purchase LineSkip passes, drinks, cover, and event tickets, at over 400 of the top nightlife venues in the country.
Venues use LineLeap’s technology to create new revenue streams and market to their customers through push notifications, in-app messages, and email campaigns.
LineLeap participated in Y combinator in the summer of 2019 and has acquired over 1 Million customers to date.
LineLeap's long term vision is to be the must-have platform for all purchases, discovery, & fun at the world’s top venues & events while being the first choice for brands to connect with consumers.

# Fun,Faster.
LineLeap is your best friend on a night out. Join over 1 million users at your favorite bars to skip long lines, pay for cover, get exclusive deals & more.
[![App Store Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/672c32830fbf68ee72aa3c57_app%20store%20\(1\).png)](https://www.lineleap.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/lineleap/id960804043>)[![Google Play Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/672c32d014e0e63cfc7bc874_google%20play.png)](https://www.lineleap.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.Lineleap>)
[Venue Owner? Learn More](https://www.lineleap.com/</venues>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/672c2c2bbdc3e17ab47d0839_Home%20Hero%20Mobile%20Device%20\(1\).webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d9148377011ea7ecf1a9e_mobile%20device%20graphic%20\(1\).webp)

## How LineLeap Works
Skip the line, pay for cover, purchase tickets, order drinks & much more at your favorite bars!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d096a120098eab33a109c_LineSkip.svg)
### LineSkip
Skip long lines at your favorite bars, venues, & events.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d09631d8dd52231686fc4_Cover.svg)
### Cover
Ditch the cash & ATM! Pay for cover directly from your phone!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d095e969c1c79b52fdc20_Events.svg)
### Events
Buy tickets to concerts & events at the best bars & venues in your area!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d09572ff7ecb239f3f1d0_Drinks.svg)
### Drinks
Get drinks on your phone! No more waiting at the bar or signing soggy receipts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d096a120098eab33a109c_LineSkip.svg)
### LineSkip
Skip long lines at your favorite bars, venues, & events.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d09631d8dd52231686fc4_Cover.svg)
### Cover
Ditch the cash & ATM! Pay for cover directly from your phone!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d095e969c1c79b52fdc20_Events.svg)
### Events
Buy tickets to concerts & events at the best bars & venues in your area!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d09572ff7ecb239f3f1d0_Drinks.svg)
### Drinks
Get drinks on your phone! No more waiting at the bar or signing soggy receipts.
[Download the App](https://www.lineleap.com/</download>)
## 500+ Bars, 120+ Campuses & Cities
LineLeap is active at your favorite bars across the United States.
[See All Locations](https://www.lineleap.com/</locations>)[Ask us to add your favorite bar!](https://www.lineleap.com/</contact>)
![Four women dressed in themed outfits, holding up their phones with ticket details, smiling together outside a bar with a green wall and colorful signs.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/672c86ff71eb9e7db8b28fca_Photo-Gallery-Img1.jpg)
![Four men standing by a 'LineLeap Entrance' sign, holding up their phones showing digital tickets, smiling outside a bar with neon lights in the background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/672c880a9cfc0abf11e14896_Photo-Gallery-Img-2.jpg)
![Five women dressed in festive outfits, holding up their phones displaying event tickets, posing and smiling together outside a bar.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/672c886e2c02d553ba7e42a8_Photo-Gallery-Img-3.jpg)
![Three fans outside a bar with a 'Game On!' neon sign, wearing Boston Celtics gear and holding up their phones showing ticket information, smiling at the camera.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/672c88774a85e7618c63cab4_Photo-Gallery-Img-4.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/6732c969320e0e24e4f7353e_Ellipse%207%20\(1\).webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f98decbe1b0be26dcd313/6732c7a3a418eb94b64bbd86_Ellipse%207.webp)
For Bars & Entertainment Venues
## Grow Revenue at No Cost. It's a No Brainer.
LineLeap's platform was designed with venue owners & customers in mind. It's simple to set up & very easy to use.
[Contact Sales >](https://www.lineleap.com/</request-more-info>)[Learn more >](https://www.lineleap.com/</venues>)

# Fun,Faster.
LineLeap is your best friend on a night out. Join over 1 million users at your favorite bars to skip long lines, pay for cover, get exclusive deals & more.
![App Store Logo⟨9⟩.png)](https://www.lineleap.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/lineleap/id960804043>)![Google Play Logo⟨10⟩](https://www.lineleap.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.Lineleap>)
Venue Owner? Learn More⟨2⟩

## How LineLeap Works
Skip the line, pay for cover, purchase tickets, order drinks & much more at your favorite bars!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d096a120098eab33a109c_LineSkip.svg)
### LineSkip
Skip long lines at your favorite bars, venues, & events.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d09631d8dd52231686fc4_Cover.svg)
### Cover
Ditch the cash & ATM! Pay for cover directly from your phone!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d095e969c1c79b52fdc20_Events.svg)
### Events
Buy tickets to concerts & events at the best bars & venues in your area!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d09572ff7ecb239f3f1d0_Drinks.svg)
### Drinks
Get drinks on your phone! No more waiting at the bar or signing soggy receipts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672c2a375ed9da06565bf236/673d096a120098eab33a109c_LineSkip.svg)

generated_description:
**LineLeap: Making Fun Faster**

Founded in 2017 and hailing from the bustling nightlife of New York, LineLeap has cultivated a mission that resonates with party-goers everywhere: to get customers to fun, faster. This isn’t just a catchy phrase; it’s the backbone of their mobile platform. With their app, users can bypass long lines at over 400 top nightlife venues across the country, purchasing LineSkip passes, drinks, cover charges, and event tickets—all from the comfort of their phones.

LineLeap isn’t just about helping customers dodge the queues; it helps venues unlock new revenue streams too. Their technology allows venues to send targeted push notifications, in-app messages, and email campaigns to reach patrons effectively. This dual approach enhances the nightlife experience for consumers while benefiting businesses.

After participating in Y Combinator’s Summer 2019 batch, LineLeap has amassed an impressive user base—over 1 million customers and counting. They’ve become a must-have companion for anyone looking to enjoy a night out without the hassle. 

But they’re not stopping there. LineLeap envisions a future where they become the definitive platform for all things related to discovery, purchasing, and enjoying top venues and events. They aim to be the first choice for brands and consumers alike, effectively closing the gap between nightlife and technology.

With a team of about 50 employees led by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, LineLeap is rapidly expanding its footprint in the nightlife scene. Whether you’re a casual party-goer or a venue owner looking to boost your business, LineLeap has something to offer.

If you’re ready to skip the line and embrace a seamless night out, head over to [LineLeap’s website](https://www.lineleap.com/) and download their app today. Why wait? Fun awaits!
